form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Affidavit Confirming Seasonal Agricultural Employment of an Applicant for Temporary Residence Status Under Section 210 of the Immigration & Nationality Act, I-705 ( (03/12/87)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/7/2023 OMB# 1115-0137 U.S. Department of Justice Affidavit Confirming Seasonal Agricultural Employment of Immigration and Naturalization Service an Applicant for Temporary Residence Status Under Section 210 of the Immigration & Nationality Act Please begin with item #1, after carefully reading the instructions. A. INFORMATION ABOUT APPLICANT- To be completed by the applicant. 1. Name (Family Name in CAPITAL Letters) (First Name) (Middle Name) 2. Date of Birth (Month/Day/Year) JACQUES CAMELIA EMILE 6/9/06 3. Address (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) (City or Town) (State) (ZIP Code) 4. Telephone Number (Include Area Code) 9000 N. W.2ND AVENUE MIAMI FLORIDA 33150 (NONE) 5. Place of Birth (City or Town) (Country, Province or State) (Country) 6. Country of Citizenship PORT - DE -PAIX HAITI HAITI B. INFORMATION ABOUT YOU, THE PERSON MAKING THE AFFIDAVIT. 7. Name (Family Name in CAPITAL Letters) (First Name) (Middle Name) 8. Telephone Number (Include Area Code) EUGENE I KANES (305) 754-2491 9. Address (No. and Street) (Apt. No.) (City or Town) (State) (ZIP Code) 52 N.E 42 STREET MIAMI FLORIDA 3 3137 10. Relationship to Applicant (Check which block(s) applies) Grower Foreman Farm Labor Contractor Union Official (Title) Other (explain) C. FIELD WORK IN PERISHABLE COMMODITIES 11. Name of Farm JHONY FARM Name of Employer Dates Employed County COLLIER State FEOGRDDA I KANES EUGENE From 8/16/85 Phone No. ( ) (NONE) To 4/14/86 Man Days Type of Type of Name Used By Applicant If Social Security Worked Fieldwork Crop Other Than Name In Block 1. Number Used 92 PICKING TOMATOES, CUCUMBERS SAME AS BLOCK SQUASH (NONE) 12. Number Used 13.
